text:
Mike Enzi (born February 1, 1944) was a United States Senator from Wyoming from 1997 to 2021. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 1997.
Early life and education.
Enzi was born on February 1, 1944 in Bremerton, Washington. He studied at George Washington University and at University of Denver.
On May 4, 2019, Enzi announced that he would not seek reelection to a fifth term in the Senate.
Personal life.
He is married to Diana Buckley. They have three children.
Enzi is a super-conservative, the term used for an extremely conservative person.
